metadata.title: CVE-2019-12473 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Wikimedia MediaWiki 1.27.0 through 1.32.1 might allow DoS. Passing invalid titles to the API could cause a DoS by querying the entire watchlist table. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and 1.27.6.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.2-1').
